Package com.group12.helper

package com.group12.helper

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BackgroundHelper
    The BackgroundHelper class provides utility methods to set background images for different scenes.
    GameBoardSetupHelper
    The GameBoardSetupHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about setting up the board for offline (against CPU) games.
    GameHelper
    The GameHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about game logic and setting up the board for offline (against CPU) games.
    HttpClientHelper
    The HttpClientHelper is class that conducts HTTP communication.
    MediaHelper
    The MediaHelper class is to manage and play media assets like background music and sound effects.
    NotificationHelper
    The NotificationHelper class provides utility methods for displaying notifications.
    OnlineGameHelper
    The OnlineGameHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about game logic and setting up the board for online games.
    StompClient
    The StompClient class is responsible for WebSocket communication using the STOMP protocol.
